amendment.description: To provide for a study of the health effects of exposure to depleted uranium.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4374 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4374 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6378) To provide for a study of the health effects of exposure to depleted uranium.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4374 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4374 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Cantwell.
